entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with snow overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
